post:
Hello again fellow LET members!

We upgraded our yearly 1GB package to 2GB for the same price.
WHY? Because we can :)
Our monthly package has been discontinued due to spammers/ddosers we aim to provide a stable services and such people are unwanted on our network.

Our servers are located in our own data centers in Stockholm and are fully owned by us.
 
We can announce your ipv4 and ipv6 subnets
 
SAS storage
LXC Virtualization
Virtualizor control panel to start, restart,stop, reinstall your vps. Monitor VPS activity, traffic, disk usage and many more
Servers are located in Sweden
1000Mbit uplink
tun/tap enable with two cli commands
Centos 6, 7
Debian 8.5, 9.6
Ubuntu 14.4, 16.4, 18.4
 
 **Setup time**
Immediately after payment.

    Processor cores: 1
    Memory: 2048 MB (2GB)
    Disk space: 100GB SAS storage
    Traffic: 800 GB
    Ipv4 IP address: 1
    Ipv6 address: /64
    Connection: 1Gbps
    Virtualization: LXC
    Country: Sweden
    Price per year: €24

[**Order here**](https://billing.swedendedicated.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=86)
[**More info**](https://swedendedicated.com/vps)

**Options**
additional ipv4: n/a for this package
additional 1TB traffic: €1.50/month

**Payment Information**
We accept paypal, credit card, bitcoins and bank transfers.

Country: Sweden
